statements: SELECT * FROM healthcare_schedule WHERE provider_id = 1;
SELECT provider_name, specialty FROM healthcare_schedule WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT * FROM healthcare_schedule WHERE provider_id > 3 ORDER BY provider_name DESC;
SELECT provider_name, specialty FROM healthcare_schedule WHERE specialty = 'Dermatology' ORDER BY provider_id ASC;
SELECT provider_name, weekly_schedule->>'monday' AS monday_schedule FROM healthcare_schedule WHERE provider_name LIKE 'Dr.%';
SELECT provider_name, specialty FROM healthcare_schedule WHERE provider_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM healthcare_schedule WHERE specialty = 'Pediatrics' AND provider_name LIKE 'Dr.%';
SELECT provider_id, provider_name, JSONB_ARRAY_LENGTH(weekly_schedule) AS num_of_days FROM healthcare_schedule ORDER BY num_of_days DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT specialty FROM healthcare_schedule WHERE provider_name LIKE '%Care%';
SELECT provider_id, provider_name, weekly_schedule ->> 'Thursday' AS thursday_schedule FROM healthcare_schedule WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT * FROM healthcare_providers WHERE specialty='Cardiology';
SELECT provider_name, specialty FROM healthcare_providers ORDER BY provider_name DESC;
SELECT provider_id, provider_name, specialty FROM healthcare_providers WHERE provider_id > 100 ORDER BY provider_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date > '2022-01-01';

SELECT provider_name, COUNT(appointment_id) AS total_appointments FROM healthcare_providers INNER JOIN appointments ON healthcare_providers.provider_id = appointments.provider_id GROUP BY provider_name;
SELECT * FROM healthcare_providers WHERE provider_id = 1;
SELECT provider_name, specialty FROM healthcare_providers ORDER BY specialty DESC;

SELECT provider_name, COUNT(appointments.appointment_id) AS appointment_count FROM healthcare_providers LEFT JOIN appointments ON healthcare_providers.provider_id = appointments.provider_id GROUP BY provider_name;

SELECT provider_name, appointment_date FROM healthcare_providers JOIN appointments ON healthcare_providers.provider_id = appointments.provider_id WHERE appointments.appointment_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY appointment_date DESC;

SELECT provider_name, specialty, COUNT(appointments.appointment_id) AS appointment_count FROM healthcare_providers LEFT JOIN appointments ON healthcare_providers.provider_id = appointments.provider_id GROUP BY provider_name, specialty ORDER BY specialty ASC;
SELECT * FROM Healthcare_Providers;
SELECT provider_name, specialty FROM Healthcare_Providers WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT patient_name, gender, phone_number FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'FEMALE' ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT patient_id, appointment_date, appointment_time FROM Appointments ORDER BY appointment_date DESC, appointment_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM Healthcare_Providers WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY provider_name DESC;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patients WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 30 ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT provider_name, specialty FROM Healthcare_Providers WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology' AND location = 'Chicago';
SELECT appointment_date, appointment_time FROM Appointments WHERE provider_id = 123 AND appointment_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY appointment_date ASC, appointment_time ASC;
SELECT patient_name, phone_number FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Female' AND age > 50;
SELECT * FROM Providers;
SELECT provider_name, specialty FROM Providers;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patients ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT provider_name, specialty FROM Providers WHERE specialty='Dentist';
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_date, appointment_time FROM Appointments WHERE appointment_date>'2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Providers WHERE specialty = 'Dentist';
SELECT patient_name, age FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT provider_name, COUNT(appointment_id) AS appointment_count FROM Providers JOIN Appointments ON Providers.provider_id = Appointments.provider_id GROUP BY provider_name;
SELECT provider_name, day_of_week, time_slots_available FROM Providers JOIN Schedule ON Providers.provider_id = Schedule.provider_id WHERE day_of_week = 'Monday';

SELECT Patients.patient_name, Providers.provider_name, Appointments.appointment_date, Appointments.appointment_time FROM Patients JOIN Appointments ON Patients.patient_id = Appointments.patient_id JOIN Providers ON Appointments.provider_id = Providers.provider_id WHERE Appointments.appointment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM healthcare_providers;
SELECT provider_name, specialty FROM healthcare_providers ORDER BY provider_name;
SELECT DISTINCT specialty FROM healthcare_providers;

SELECT provider_name, patient_name, appointment_time FROM healthcare_providers INNER JOIN appointments ON healthcare_providers.provider_id = appointments.provider_id INNER JOIN patients ON appointments.patient_id = patients.patient_id;
SELECT provider_name, schedule_date, start_time, end_time FROM healthcare_providers INNER JOIN schedules ON healthcare_providers.provider_id = schedules.provider_id ORDER BY schedule_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM healthcare_providers;
SELECT provider_name, specialty FROM healthcare_providers ORDER BY specialty DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_appointments FROM appointments WHERE provider_id = 1;
SELECT provider_name, schedule_date, start_time, end_time FROM healthcare_providers INNER JOIN schedules ON healthcare_providers.provider_id = schedules.provider_id;
SELECT patient_name, patient_phone, appointment_time FROM patients INNER JOIN appointments ON patients.patient_id = appointments.patient_id WHERE appointments.provider_id = 2;
